thread.title: Arthur Huang Designed Stackable AIRBAG Boxes for Air Max Day
thread.title_full: Arthur Huang Designed Stackable AIRBAG Boxes for Air Max Day

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Arthur Huang Designed Stackable AIRBAG Boxes for Air Max Day
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
To complement his all-black Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 designed for Air Max Day 2017 , Arthur Huang has also created a lightweight package made entirely of post-consumer materials.
Constructed from milk and orange juice containers, as well as morning coffee lids, the box is then produced from a single process Polypropylene with no added chemicals. Ultimately, the modular design allows it to be used as a stackable, interlocking component of a product display or storage system.
The stackable AIRBAG boxes thus present the infinite possibilities of Nike’s sustainability vision at Huang’s early launch event at INVINCIBLE in Taiwan.
You can look forward to the Arthur Huang x NikeLab Air Max 1 FK Royal becoming available at INVINCIBLE on March 23.
